scripts.clean: rm -f simple/simple.js simple/simple.css material/material.js material/material.css material/material.mjs
scripts.build: npm run clean && node build.js && tsc -p . && npm run size
scripts.size: echo simple.css && gzip-size simple/simple.css && echo simple.js && gzip-size simple/simple.js && echo material.css && gzip-size material/material.css && echo material.js && gzip-size material/material.js
